sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: Will arrive at Chloe’s orphanage. The Orphanage is as well as it could be, it has seen better years but at the very least it is well maintained.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: As Will is nearing the entrance he spots a familiar figure.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: The figure is Tims, like Anna and Will, he also grew up in the orphanage, so they are quite close.

sentences.name: Narator
sentences.sentence: Tims seems to be fixing something near the entrance.

sentences.name: Tims
sentences.sentence: There . . . that should do it, who knows the random stuff Chloe teaches would come in handy like this. Thankfully the rain stopped.

sentences.name: Tims
sentences.sentence: Will? Oh my god Will. . . What are you doing?

sentences.name: Tims
sentences.sentence: Have you been bathing in the rain!? You are soaking. Let’s get you inside.
